list.name: NEST-EGG
list.description: Belle places a trap on the ground that will explode when triggered by an opponent. The trap deals x damage, and slows down anyone within its blast radius for x seconds.
list.descriptionHtml: Belle places a trap on the ground that will explode when triggered by an opponent. The trap deals x damage, and slows down anyone within its blast radius for x seconds.

list.name: REVERSE-POLARITY
list.description: Belle's next Electro-Bolt bounces from walls.
list.descriptionHtml: Belle's next Electro-Bolt bounces from walls.
